title: One Step at a Time
description:
After doctors said he would never walk again, Robert Paylor made a miraculous recovery. Now, he's using his experience to help and inspire others.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
